document_data.name: Mayonnaise
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mayonnaise''' was a type of food largely unknown to [[Toril]].{{Cite dragon/185/Magic in the Evening|59}}

{{quote|''Have you such a thing about as the makings of a [[sandwich]]? In this [[earth|world]], once, I was introduced to something called "mayo" that almost made up for the horribly transformed material they tried to pass off as meat in the same sandwich.''|[[Mordenkainen]]}}
document_data.History: Following the [[Second Sundering]], ''[[alchemy jug]]s'' were found to be able to produce mayonnaise.<ref group="note" name="food">Prior to 5{{th}} edition, books detailing the ''alchemy jug'' made no mention of them being able to produce mayonnaise.
